{"id":402016240,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2 years, 11 months","timestamp":1601339343,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"172 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/402016240/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"14.5 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def validPalindrome(self, s: str) -> bool:\n        def isPalindrome(s: str, l: int, r: int):\n            return all(s[l+k] == s[r-k] for k in range((r-l+1) // 2))\n        \n        n = len(s)\n        for i in range(n // 2):\n            j = n - 1 - i\n            if i < j and s[i] != s[j]:\n                return isPalindrome(s, i+1, j) or isPalindrome(s, i, j-1)\n        return True","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
